column6: As the X-Men face a splashy televised death in Dallas, Phil Sheldon and his family have a quiet and unexpected late-night reunion. Will it be their last time together as a family? What will it mean for Phil's legacy, and his book?
column8: | letterer:Comicraft | penciller:Jay Anacleto | writer:Kurt Busiek | writer:Roger Stern | colorist:Brian Haberlin
